title: Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
Today on The Dan Patrick Show, Jason Smith and Mike Harmon fill in for the crew and dive right into Kyrie Irving’s return to Boston in the playoffs, specifically the point guard’s hostile gestures. NFL veteran and insider Bucky Brooks joins the show to share some insight on Terrell Owens’ football comeback, and Baker Mayfield’s whirlwind offseason. Plus, NBA Insider Ric Bucher joins the show to share some insight on Kyrie Irving’s hostile weekend, the probability Phoenix has to win it all, and more!

#jss

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
